extendedInfo.description: PH Weather features current weather condition and seven-day forecasts in different locations worldwide. This app is currently focused in the Philippine weather conditions, forecasts and news. The satellite images cover mostly the Philippines, Taiwan and other neighboring southeast Asian countries. Images can be animated and supports panning, zooming and pinch-to-zoom! And be notified when it rains based on the forecasts!You need to enable Google "Location Services" inorder to use the Locations and Weather tabs. Please read: http://support.google.com/gmm/bin/answer.py?hl=en&answer=1646140Like on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PHWeatherMobileFollow on Twitter: http://twitter.com/ph_weatherFeatures Summary:1. Current Weather* Condition* Temperature* Wind speed and direction* Sunrise and Sunset* Humidity and Pressure2. Seven Day Forecasts* 3-hourly interval* Minimum/maximum temperatures* Precipitation * Humidity* Wind speed and direction3. Weather Locations* Supports different locations worldwide* Flexible timezone settings4. Satellite* DOST-PAGASA - MTSAT ENHANCED IR Satellite Image* Kochi University, Japan - infrared image* University of Wisconsin-Madison, USA - animated IR satellite* National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) - Rainbow / AVN Color * Auto/manual animation* Supports panning, zooming and pinch-to-zoom5. News* DOST-PAGASA 24-hour public weather forecast* DOST-PAGASA official twitter posts * Weather News Stories from different media sources6. Cyclone* DOST-PAGASA Cyclone Updates* Joint Typhoon Warning Center (JTWC) Active Cyclone Warnings* Joint Typhoon Warning Center (JTWC) Track Archive7. Cyclone Info and Map Tracks* JTWC Warning Text (for active cyclone only)* JTWC Warning Graphic (for active cyclone only)* JTWC Cyclone Tracks (rendered in Google Maps). It can also pin point your current location on the map. (both for active and archive cyclone)* Plot PAR (Philippine Area of Responsibility)PLUS:* Rain Alert Notifications* Share app screenshot to FB, Twitter, etc (via applications)* Very customizable and flexible settingsKeywords: Philippine Weather, Pinoy Weather, Philippine Cyclone, Western Pacific CycloneBugs/Issues/Suggestions/Support: Email to android@phweather.comDISCLAIMER:Do not use this app to make life or death decision. For informational purposes only. Please refer to the official authorities.PH Weather app cannot guarantee the accuracy and availability of data. Neither PH Weather app nor the developer shall be held liable for any errors and/or delays in content.

reviews.title: Five if sunrise sunset worked and fahrenheit temp
reviews.comment: After some fussing I got the location to work, but the sunrise/sunset always shows: \"Unavailable\". Also no way that I can find to change from celsius to fahrenheit. Too bad the ads seem to work ok.
reviews.author: john baughman

reviews.title: Not so Good, bearable enough

reviews.title: Pierre SGN2 Jellybean
reviews.comment: My favourite weather app for this region has improved but still difficult / impossible to add new locations & weird zoom of satellite imagery when change from landscape to portrait. Never have these problems when I was using SGS2 Gingerbread. Please help to solve them...
